review_data.title: Nordsee at main train station
review_data.content: Great selection of excellent fish and shellfish, at a good price and open all day. The chips are excellent, if a little dry.

review_data.title: great for a healthy salmon sandwich or take out

review_data.title: Good Seafood into a Train - Station
review_data.content: Nordsee loacated within Zurich Hauptbahnhof, has a variety of seafood, at right prices ( < $50 US for a couple of decent meals - including dessert). The place was crowded ( mostly travelers) , but the atmosphere was just right.

review_data.title: A fresh fish meal

review_data.title: For fish lover
review_data.content: The lovely chain restaurant is situated inside Zurich hb station. Like other Nordsee lot of choices of sea foods. Lot of combination and lot of fresh fishes. A perfect restaurant for any fish lover like me. Food is nice and price moderate.
